content:
I am a full-stack software engineer with experience in developing robust and efficient software solutions using Java, Spring Boot, Angular, and React. I have a strong background in back-end web application development using technologies such as Spring Boot, ASP.NET Core, NodeJS, and ExpressJS, as well as front-end web application development using Angular, ReactJS; testing and debugging with Jest, and xUnit. I am passionate about implementing solutions to real-world problems and am always open to learning new technologies. I graduated from IIT, JU with a degree in Information Technology and have actively participated in over 25 national and international onsite programming competitions, as well as over 300 online competitions. I have solved over 3000 programming tasks in numerous online judges, showcasing my strong problem-solving skills and analytical abilities.
Research My research interests are in the intersection of Software Engineering (SE), Programming Languages (PL), and Artificial Intelligence (AI). Broadly, I am focusing on SE for AI, and engineering AI based software systems for fairness, safety, and robustness. 
Download my curriculum vitae. Feel free to reach out.
summary: am a full-stack software engineer with experience in developing robust and efficient software solutions using Java, Spring Boot, Angular, and React.
title: Farhad Hossain
